name: Cat Lady Private Beta
description: I recently got a new macbook and my files of my desktop from icloud backed up from a previous macbook I had 2 years ago. Coincidentally 2 years ago I was fortunate enough to participate in the Cat Lady Private Beta, I downloaded it on my mac and made a backup since I knew it was going away and I loved the game. I now own the full-ish version on steam but the project got cancelled. I think it's such a shame that such a great game was cancelled. I hope that if I release the private beta there will be new hype in this game and the project might be rebooted. This is mac only though since I downloaded it on my mac at a debate tournament. I don't know if I also backed it up on my computer, I'll check later and hopefully upload that too.
